Intr.Value: can be put inside and taken outside of the bowl.
can be either full or empty.

can be flipped upside down, either to remove its contents or to cover a smaller item, in which case it also stands on a flat surface, such as a table, with its opening facing downward and its bottom surface facing upward.

Affordance.Formula: If I grab the side surface or the bottom surface and push upwards, the entire bowl and its contents (if any) will shift upwards.
If the bowl is full and I rotate it around a horizontal axis, its contents will fall out.
